description: Mr. 3 coats Luffy's fists and feet with his Doru Doru no Mi wax, creating protective armor that allows Luffy to strike poison users like Magellan without being affected. The wax is hard enough to resist Magellan's deadly poison.
firstUseContext: Created during the Impel Down escape to give Luffy a way to fight Magellan without being poisoned.
strengths: Provides immunity to Magellan's poison on contact
Maintains the hardness and protective qualities of Mr. 3's wax
Allows Luffy to use his full arsenal of techniques
weaknesses: Dependent on Mr. 3 being present to create and maintain the wax
Wax can potentially be damaged or destroyed
Limits collaboration as Mr. 3 must focus on maintaining the armor

description: An enhanced version of Gomu Gomu no Pistol where Luffy's fist is coated with Mr. 3's wax armor. This allows him to strike poisonous opponents like Magellan without being poisoned himself.
firstUseContext: First used against Magellan during their rematch on Level 1 of Impel Down, successfully landing a hit on the warden.
strengths: Combines rubber stretching with wax protection
Can hit poison users safely
Maintains the speed and power of the original Pistol attack
weaknesses: Requires Mr. 3's wax coating to function

description: An enhanced version of Gomu Gomu no Bazooka where both of Luffy's fists are coated with Mr. 3's wax armor, allowing him to deliver a powerful two-handed strike against poisonous opponents.
firstUseContext: Used against Magellan during their battle on Level 1 of Impel Down.
strengths: Double the striking power of Champion Rifle
Wax protection on both fists
Effective against poison users
weaknesses: Requires Mr. 3's wax coating on both hands
Wax can be damaged or destroyed

description: Mr. 3 creates a large wall of hardened wax using his Doru Doru no Mi powers. The wax is strong enough to block Magellan's poisonous Hydra attacks, demonstrating that the wax can resist poison.
firstUseContext: Created to block Magellan's Hydra attack during the escape from Impel Down, protecting the prisoners and revealing that wax can counter poison.
strengths: Can block Magellan's poison attacks
Provides defensive protection for multiple people
Quick to deploy
weaknesses: Can potentially be destroyed by overwhelming force

description: A Fish-Man Jujutsu technique where the user performs a bowl-shaped gesture with their hands and physically grabs and manipulates water currents as if manipulating cloth. In the anime, it appears as a glowing blue-white orb of water that can be redirected.
firstUseContext: Used by Jinbe in the waters outside Impel Down to create a current for launching prisoners onto a Marine battleship.
strengths: Can manipulate large amounts of water
Effective in ocean environments
Sets up for more powerful techniques like Kairyu Ipponzeoi

description: A Fish-Man Jujutsu technique performed after Mizugokoro. The user heaves the manipulated water current upward, causing it to erupt from the ocean surface as a towering stream of water. Can be used to launch objects or people great distances.
firstUseContext: Used by Jinbe to launch a door carrying Buggy, Crocodile, and Mr. 1 from the Impel Down bay onto a distant Marine battleship.
strengths: Can launch objects/people over great distances
Utilizes ocean currents for massive power
Effective for transportation and mobility
weaknesses: Requires Mizugokoro to be performed first

description: A Fish-Man Karate technique where the user hurls a water projectile with enough force to pierce through solid objects. Jinbe can use this technique from great distances with devastating accuracy.
firstUseContext: Used by Jinbe to pierce through a Marine battleship diagonally from a distance, helping Buggy, Crocodile, and Mr. 1 deal with the Marines aboard.
strengths: Long-range attack capability
Can pierce through ships and solid structures
Highly accurate
